trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <see langword="<input type=reset>" /> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML <see langword="<input type=reset>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset> class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> class and is used to create a button control on a Web page that resets form controls to their initial values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>類別，並且可用來建立將表單控制項重設為其初始值的網頁上的按鈕控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset> control is often used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> control, which is used to create a button control that submits the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>控制項則通常搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>控制項，用來建立送出表單的按鈕控制項。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset> control to reset the values of a form on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>控制項加入表單，以在網頁上的值重設。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The "reset" literal string.
trans-unit.target: 「 重設 」 常值字串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset> control to reset the values of a Web page form.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>控制項重設網頁表單的值。

trans-unit.source: The input type.
trans-unit.target: 輸入型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> class using the specified input type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的輸入型別，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The value of the `type` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `type` 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `type` parameter to a value not recognized as a valid HTML `<input>` element results in a default HTML `<input>` element as a single-line text input field.
trans-unit.target: 設定`type`參數的值未被辨認為有效的 HTML`<input>`項目會產生預設 HTML`<input>`為單行文字輸入欄位的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset> control to reset the values of a Web page form.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>控制項重設網頁表單的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether validation is performed when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> 控制項時，是否執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if validation is performed when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> control is clicked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> 控制項時會執行驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset.CausesValidation%2A> property is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset.CausesValidation%2A>屬性不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> control is clicked on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下 Web 網頁上的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> 控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset.ServerClick> event is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset.ServerClick>事件不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項群組，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The group of controls for which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項群組，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset" /> 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset.ValidationGroup%2A> property is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset.ValidationGroup%2A>屬性不是直接從您的程式碼使用。
